extendedInfo.description: The ultimate alchemy manager for The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim game.With this application you can find optimal combinations for any objective. Get the maximum benefit or the effects you want. Create pure potions and poisons. Create recipes to discover the largest number of effects. Try different alchemy perks before upgrading. Increase quickly your gold and your skills.Features:- Calculates all available recipes you can do with a set of ingredients. Searches by all the 33,682 optimal combinations with all common ingredients, Dawnguard, Hearthfire and Dragonborn DLCs.- Allows you to manage many character status. It remembers current skills, selected perks and equipment of the character. These values ââhave influence on alchemy results.- The value, magnitude and duration of effects in the recipes are calculated taking into account the character status. Therefore, the effects are the same in the game.- Takes into consideration "special" ingredients which multiply (sometimes x100) the value, magnitude and duration of some effects.- You can save ingredients information on every character status: selections, the amount you have and the discovered effects in the game.- You can use these information in searches to find available recipes with your inventory and new recipes to discover new effects.- When you make a recipe in the game, you just have to push a button to update the discovered effects and number of ingredients. There's no need to update manually the character status in the application.- You can do quick searches by simply selecting ingredients from the list. You donât need to set the character status, or inventory, or discovered effects.- Search results can be re-filtered and sorted without having to do a new search.- Save your favorite recipes and share them by an unique ID. You can share them using applications, social networks and the web.- You can search for recipes using the unique ID, which are the same in all languagesââ.- Valid for all versions: PC, Xbox 360 and PS3.There are many available search options:* Ingredients: Determined by the inventory, selected ingredients or DLCs.* Effects: Several options depending on selected effects.* Combinations: Two and / or three ingredients.* Results: Several options depending on whether they are special, pure, or use DLCs.* Sort: By ingredient names, main effect names, number of discovered effects, value, cost of ingredients, ratio value/cost, number of possible potions, recipe ID, favorite recipe name and number of effects.Versions:- FREE: Free version is fully functional but has ads and search is limited to one per minute. However, during that time you can filter the results of the previous search. The favorite recipes are limited to 5.- PRO: Pro version has the same functionality, but it has no ads and no limits.Languages:- Fully translated into ENGLISH, SPANISH, GERMAN, CZECH, FRENCH, ITALIAN, POLISH, RUSSIAN and JAPANESE.Requirements:- An Android 2.1 device or higher (API Level 7)User Permissions:CHECK_LICENSE: Required for Google Play.INTERNET: Required for wiki details and share recipes (AddThis).WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Required for share recipes (AddThis).If you have ideas, comments, bugs or translation issues, write to:skyrimalchemypro@develmob.comHelp us to improve this app:- Rate it, give it +1, comment it, share.Have fun.

reviews.title: Great app, very useful
reviews.comment: The only worthwhile app to assist in your Skyrim alchemy work, as far as I\'m concerned.  Once you figure out how it works, this can help you brew potions like a pro, regardless of whether you\'re looking to max profit, make specific potions for your own use, or just efficiently level up your skill.  Keep up the good work, development team.
reviews.author: Shawn Tucker

reviews.title: Totally awesome!
reviews.comment: If you want to make the most out of alchemic reactions, this app is a MUST! Keeps track of your items and shows what kind of potions you can make and how many and you can even sort it by how much value they are so you can earn that good money :) And after youve made the potion and told the app that you made # of that potion, the app updates the results so youll know what you can do with your remaining ingredients. Time consuming inputting stuff but totally worth it!
reviews.author: S Ang

reviews.title: Exceptional app.
reviews.comment: Well put together, simple to use, and exponentially increases profits on Skyrim.  Input your ingredients, what you want out of them (poisons/potions, profit, etc.), and mix to your heart\'s content (or until you run out of usable ingredients)  Things it would be nice to see: A way to. Increase your level at a touch from the \"create potion\" page. A way to move data from the free app and the Pro app.  Had the free app for a few days and felt it was so useful I wanted to support the creators.
reviews.author: blueanubisalpha

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Glad to have it all right here in my pocket. And having the ID string here allows me to add the item to my inventory from the console on the PC version
reviews.author: Robert Chizmadia

reviews.title: Best in its category.
reviews.comment: Took me a few minutes to suss it out but don\'t let that put you off. High quality app.
reviews.author: Michael Jones

reviews.title: Waste of money
reviews.comment: There is no way to save my favourite recipes, ID thing is beyond me? What a waste of time and money..uninstalling straight away..
reviews.author: Ricky Uk

reviews.title: Good but..
reviews.comment: You can\'t remove your ingredients easily. Fire this reason I prefer Skrim Crafter Pro, this one\'s nicer graphically though.. Yes i have both.
reviews.author: Andrew O\'Brien

reviews.title: No way to import from free? Really?
reviews.comment: It\'s a great app, but not worth paying for without a way to import your settings from the free version. I would spend far more time than the few seconds I have to wait between scans on re-entering all they inventory and known portions. Getting a refund until there\'s an import feature.
reviews.author: Tom McCluskey

reviews.title: Excellent assistant
reviews.comment: Easy to use comprehensive alchemy assistant.  I fly through menus with ease.  Pick an ingredient, see what it produces, click that and your off.
reviews.author: Nathan Hudson

reviews.title: Glad to see active development
reviews.comment: I was using the free version for quite a while, but seeing active development is what prompted me to finally buy it. Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Esper Wyrenth

reviews.comment: Nothing wrong to say about this app
reviews.author: Gabriel Santandreu Mir\303\263

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: This is the best alchemy app I\'ve come across and very helpful to getting the most value from your ingredients. What would be really awesome is to be able to link this app to your game so it can be updated off your current inventory without you inputting them.
reviews.author: Joey Dopler

reviews.title: Great app but...
reviews.comment: You need to roll out that \"saved recipe\" feature asap. creating so many potions but sometimes forget the recipe and then I have to go digging through results to find it again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: If you find it hard to use this app, you\'re doing it wrong. The only tedious thing about this is manually inputting the ingredients, but there probably wouldn\'t be a way to automate it in real time on console without doing a little hacking.  Anyway: -Many filtering and sorting options -Filter by selected effects is awesome -Filter by owned ingredients is great -Create in game automatic updating is useful
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Once you figure out how to use this, you\'ll wonder how you ever got by without this application. My Speech and Alchemy skills skyrocketed, as well as my Septims. Just buy ingredients and make the most expensive potions and poisons possible, and you\'ll turn amazing profits.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good search and interface
reviews.comment: This is the first cut of this app, and with a couple of added features... both planned, then it will be even better: saving recipes, and more complete guide. Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best on the market
reviews.comment: Intuitive, great response from developers
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice app for skyrim
reviews.author: Pavel Tsaregorodtsev

reviews.title: Just one more thing
reviews.comment: Loved the app but Fortify Alchemy can go up to 125%
reviews.author: Jose Javier Alacan Rios

reviews.title: Great app, some annoying bugs
reviews.comment: This is a great app, if a bit unwieldy. However, on my HTC Flyer, it likes to go back by one page every ten seconds which causes me to frequently lose work. Also, it would be nice to be able to adjust the number of owned ingredients without having to enter the page of each individual ingredient. In conclusion, it\'s definitely worth paying for and is a great app.
reviews.author: Zach Jenkins
